segments.text: I see the woman is really focused on that plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't even noticed the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't slipped yet with all that water around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being quite adventurous, climbing up to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be his partner in crime, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they've been planning this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so inviting and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos unfolding in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should do something, but I don't want to interfere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a scene of domestic chaos and childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
